programme.title: The Rest Is History - The Early Days Of Jungle & Drum N Bass
programme.desc: An exhilarating look into the formative years of the beloved underground art form Jungle and Drum & Bass music and its continued legacy today.

programme.title: SPIN x Fire: Free Speech + Other Dirty Words
programme.desc: Hear Etheridge discuss her message and mission in Free Speech + Other Dirty Words, presented by SPIN and the FIRE, and hosted by Ryan Downey.

programme.title: MOD SUN Interview: Walk With Me | SPIN Cover Story
programme.desc: No doubt MOD’s lived many lives since Happy To Be Here was first published in 2015, stating that he feels fortunate to have accomplished so much of what he’d set out to do. His main goal is to keep evolving.

programme.title: Kittie: Origins/evolutions
programme.desc: The first and most popular all-female metal band explores their 90's roots and their 25 years of breaking through barriers.

programme.title: LoudQUIETloud: A Film About the Pixies
programme.desc: loudQUIETloud follows the rehearsals and the warm-up shows for the full-fledged, sold-out Pixies reunion tour. It also catalogs, in the cinema-verite style of the Rolling Stones' Gimme Shelter, the less glamorous side of the touring band lifestyle, getting as close to this enigmatic act as anyone is ever likely to get. The Pixies have a once-in-a-lifetime chance at rock n roll redemption.

programme.title: SPIN Presents: Trailers From Hell
programme.desc: From Amadeus the worlds first rockstar to The Beatles and Elvis, Hollywood has always remembered "When Rock Was Young"

programme.title: Until The Light Takes Us
programme.desc: Until The Light Takes Us tells the story of black metal. Part music scene and part cultural uprising, black metal rose to worldwide notoriety in the mid-nineties when a rash of suicides, murders, and church burnings accompanied the explosive artistic growth and output of a music scene that would forever redefine what heavy metal is and what it stands for.

programme.title: SPIN x Fire: Free Speech + Other Dirty Words
programme.desc: Hear Morello discuss his message and mission in Free Speech + Other Dirty Words, presented by SPIN and the FIRE, and hosted by Ryan Downey.

programme.title: Blitzed: The 80s Blitz Kids Story
programme.desc: Boy George was the coat check girl (admittedly stealing money from the purses) .... Bowie, synth beats, and a new freedom of sexual identity were in the air. The Blitz Club spell was cast and a hotbed of talent emerged: Ultravox, Spandau Ballet, Culture Club, Sade, and practically everyone else you've ever heard from the era.

programme.title: MOD SUN Interview: Walk With Me | SPIN Cover Story
programme.desc: No doubt MOD’s lived many lives since Happy To Be Here was first published in 2015, stating that he feels fortunate to have accomplished so much of what he’d set out to do. His main goal is to keep evolving.

programme.title: Gil Scott-Heron - Black Wax
programme.desc: BLACK WAX is a musical-political entertainment film produced and directed by Robert Mugge. It centers on the late African American poet-singer-songwriter Gil Scott-Heron - the man Melody Maker called the most dangerous musician alive and many dubbed the forefather of rap music - and his Midnight Band.

programme.title: SPIN COVER STORY yungblud: "walk with me"
programme.desc: If Yungblud led a cult, many would join - even those who fancy themselves hard to persuade. He has an orbit, an aura, an affability that is borderline intoxicating. You can experience it for yourself during our walk with Yungblud through the Sunset Strip, from the Viper Room to the Rainbow Bar and Grill – watch Yungblud share some incredible stories and a Dr Pepper

programme.title: Looking for Johnny: The Legend of Johnny Thunders
programme.desc: Johnny Thunders was the legendary hard-living rock n roll guitarist who inspired glam-metal, punk and the music scene in general. Looking For Johnny is a 90-minute film that documents Thunders career from his beginnings to his tragic death in 1991. The film examines his career as a member of the New York Dolls, the punk scene with The Heartbreakers in New York City and London and much more.

programme.title: LoudQUIETloud: A Film About the Pixies
programme.desc: loudQUIETloud follows the rehearsals and the warm-up shows for the full-fledged, sold-out Pixies reunion tour. It also catalogs, in the cinema-verite style of the Rolling Stones' Gimme Shelter, the less glamorous side of the touring band lifestyle, getting as close to this enigmatic act as anyone is ever likely to get. The Pixies have a once-in-a-lifetime chance at rock n roll redemption.
